channel.title: CVE Feed for prometheus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for prometheus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-40577|2024-10-02T17:48:58.532Z -- prometheus -- alertmanager
item.description: Alertmanager handles alerts sent by client applications such as the Prometheus server. An attacker with the permission to perform POST requests on the /api/v1/alerts endpoint could be able to execute arbitrary JavaScript code on the users of Prometheus Alertmanager. This issue has been fixed in Alertmanager version 0.2.51.
